1.text: And these are births of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth; and born to them are sons after the deluge.

2.text: Sons of Japheth are Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

3.text: And sons of Gomer are Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

4.text: And sons of Javan are Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

5.text: By these have the isles of the nations been parted in their lands, each by his tongue, by their families, in their nations.

6.text: And sons of Ham are Cush, and Mitzraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

7.text: And sons of Cush are Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtechah; and sons of Raamah are Sheba and Dedan.

9.text: he hath begun to be a hero in the land; he hath been a hero in hunting before Jehovah; therefore it is said, ‘As Nimrod the hero in hunting before Jehovah.’

10.text: And the first part of his kingdom is Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar;

11.text: from that land he hath gone out to Asshur, and buildeth Nineveh, even the broad places of the city, and Calah,

12.text: and Resen, between Nineveh and Calah; it is the great city.

13.text: And Mitzraim hath begotten the Ludim, and the Anamim, and the Lehabim, and the Naphtuhim,

14.text: and the Pathrusim, and the Casluhim, (whence have come out Philistim,) and the Caphtorim.

15.text: And Canaan hath begotten Sidon his first-born, and Heth,

16.text: and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

17.text: and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

18.text: and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite; and afterwards have the families of the Canaanite been scattered.

19.text: And the border of the Canaanite is from Sidon, in thy coming towards Gerar, unto Gaza; in thy coming towards Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, unto Lasha.

20.text: These are sons of Ham, by their families, by their tongues, in their lands, in their nations.

21.text: As to Shem, father of all sons of Eber, brother of Japheth the elder, he hath also begotten:

22.text: Sons of Shem are Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

23.text: And sons of Aram are Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

24.text: And Arphaxad hath begotten Salah, and Salah hath begotten Eber.

25.text: And to Eber have two sons been born; the name of the one is Peleg (for in his days hath the earth been divided,) and his brother’s name is Joktan.

26.text: And Joktan hath begotten Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

27.text: and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

28.text: and Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

29.text: and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab; all these are sons of Joktan;

30.text: and their dwelling is from Mesha, in thy coming towards Sephar, a mount of the east.

31.text: These are sons of Shem, by their families, by their tongues, in their lands, by their nations.

32.text: These are families of the sons of Noah, by their births, in their nations, and by these have the nations been parted in the earth after the deluge.
